channel.title: Economics on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Economics on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: An Account Using the Same Name as Trump’s BLS Pick Posted Red-Pilled Conspiracy Theories
item.description: A WIRED review of a now deleted Twitter account that used the screen name “Dr. Erwin J. Antoni III” shows it posted conspiratorial content about the 2020 election, Covid-19, and Jeffrey Epstein.

item.title: An Account Using the Same Name as Trump’s BLS Pick Posted Red-Pilled Conspiracy Theories
item.description: A WIRED review of a now deleted Twitter account that used the screen name “Dr. Erwin J. Antoni III” shows it posted conspiratorial content about the 2020 election, Covid-19, and Jeffrey Epstein.

item.title: Trump Is Undermining Trust in Official Economic Statistics. China Shows Where That Path Can Lead
item.description: China demonstrates how manipulating economic data can ultimately erode government credibility.
